Vector Born Infectious Disease meeting

Conference year: 2020

Disciplines: Virology, Infectious Disease,ector-borne diseases to provide comprehensive, state-of-the-art information on vector biology and transmission, epidemiology and disease control, host defense and human immune responses to infection, diagnosis, pathogenesis and treatment, and vaccines and therapeutics

Total years: 1

Society name: The University of Texas Medical Branch, Nature Communications, and npj Vaccines

Society members: Not Applicable

Attendees: 200

Venues: Moody Gardens Hotel, Galveston, TX

Frequency: Annual

Sponsors: The University of Texas Medical Branch, Nature Communications, and npj Vaccines

Is virtual?: None

Digital archives: None

Cost: $2000-4000

Registration fee: $200-$675
